original_text: And Zillah, she also bare Tubalcain, an instructer of every artificer in brass and iron: and the sister of Tubalcain was Naamah.
korean_text: 씰라는 두발가인을 낳았으니 그는 구리와 쇠로 여러 가지 기구를 만드는 자요 두발가인의 누이는 나아마였더라

sentences.original_text: And Zillah, she also bare Tubalcain
an instructer of every artificer in brass and iron
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 모든 청동과 철 장인의 가르침을 받은 자였고

sentences.original_text: and the sister of Tubalcain was Naamah
